notes:
Representation Permission

I .................................... of ............................................. do authorize you to act on my behalf in Securing my covering papers from the court and take up all necessary processes needed to conclude the release of my inheritance bequeathed to me by my relation Late Mr. Andrew Fong of value US$17,500,000 .00.
Yours sincerely
Name:................. 
Address:.............
Tel: .................

messages.body:
RayNaz returns as Willard Fong. Naz has appeared in more scamoscopies than you can shake a stick at, among them THE LOAN RANGER, COME ON, FEEL THE ILLINOISE!, LIGHTS, KAMARA, ACTION, THIS IS YOUR BRAIN ON 419, and many other adventures. Naz appears courtesy of Scambaiters Equity. Classic scam phrases highlighted for the new visitor.
 
Ladies and Gents, raynaz Productions, INK, presents yet another saga for your amusement...

Starring, in order of appearance:
, the Barrister-Lad, with-ca$h-in-hand
, the innocent victim........NOT quite!
, a Barrister's Barrister
, the esteemed relative from the East
, who saves the day (an honorable mention)

...Please turn off all cell-phones and pagers, we are about to begin...
messages.raw:
RayNaz returns as Willard Fong. Naz has appeared in more scamoscopies than you can shake a stick at, among them THE LOAN RANGER, COME ON, FEEL THE ILLINOISE!, LIGHTS, KAMARA, ACTION, THIS IS YOUR BRAIN ON 419, and many other adventures. Naz appears courtesy of Scambaiters Equity. Classic scam phrases highlighted for the new visitor.

Ladies and Gents, raynaz Productions, INK, presents yet another saga for your amusement...

Starring, in order of appearance:

WONG FONG, the Barrister-Lad, with-ca$h-in-hand
WILLARD FONG, the innocent victim........NOT quite!
BAHARUDEN SHAFIQ, a Barrister's Barrister
LONG FONG, the esteemed relative from the East
MAGNUM, P.I., who saves the day (an honorable mention)

...Please turn off all cell-phones and pagers, we are about to begin...

messages.body:
)] (Telstra)




WONG FONG & ASSOCIATES 
8TH FLOOR, MENARA SAFUAN,
80, JALAN AMPANG 50450
MALAYSIA
Tel:+60122442893
Dear Friend
I am Wong Fong, an attorney at law and i would love to share with you a very important business proposition that will be of mutual benefit to both of us.
A deceased client of mine,who here in after shall be referred to as my late client,died as the result of a heart-related condition on the 11 November 2001. His heart condition was due to the death of all the members of his family in the Gulf Air Flight Crashes in Persian Gulf 
Near Bahrain Aired August 23, 2000 - 2:50 p.m. ET as reported 
on:http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/0008/23/bn.08.html
I have contacted you to assist in distributing the money left behind by my client before it is confiscated or declared unserviceable by the bank where this deposit valued at Seventeen million five hundrend dollars( 
US$17.5 million dollars) is lodged. This bank has issued me a notice to contact the next of kin,or the account will be confiscated.
My proposition to you is to seek your consent to present you as the next-of-kin and beneficiary of my named client,so that the proceeds of this account can be paid to you.Then we can share the amount on a mutually agreed-upon percentage. All legal documents to back up your claim as my client's next-of-kin will be provided.All I require is your honest cooperation to enable us see this transaction through.
This will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you from many breach of the law.If this business proposition offends your moral values,do accept my apology. I must use this opportunity to implore you to exercise the utmost indulgence to keep this matter 
extraordinary confidential, whatever your decision, while I await your prompt response.Please contact me at once to indicate your interest.
I will like you to acknowledge the receipt of this e-mail as soon as possible via my private EMAIL:(wongfong_chambers@hotmail.com). And treat with absolute confidentiality and sincerity.I look forward to your quick reply.
Email:wongfong_chambers@hotmail.com
Best regards, 
Barr Wong Fong 
(Attorney at Law)

messages.body:
Dear Barrister Wong Fong,

My name is Willard Fong, I am an American, of Chinese Heritage.

This sounds interesting, and I hope you will forgive me for a delay in responding, but I am now at my workplace, and this computer is not secure. I do not want my co-workers to know anything about this, or they will want to join into the deal, and you stressed confidentiality.

I will contact you again in a few hours, when I can use my own computer. I hope this is satisfactory.

May your ancestors rest in perfect harmony in the skies.

Willard Fong
messages.raw:
Willard Fong

messages.body:
X-Originating-IP:  (Telekom Malaysia)







Dear Willard Fong,
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail with thanks.

How are you doing and your family?
All I need now is your cooperation to file in your name as the next of kin because in the record there is no known successor to this deposit of the deceased who died without a will and based on the situation at hand due to time constraint, if this fund is not claimed the government will seize this fund. All documents relating to this transaction will be given to you as we progress.

I want this done so that I can use a good part of my share for helping the poor and the needy and for charity works. You shall receive 45% for your assistance.
However, I must assure you that this transaction is safe and all modalities is in place to ensure that this is done in a legitimate way without a single breach of law. Based on your maximum cooperation, we will finalise this transaction within ten working days.
I shall require from you , your FULL NAME and CONTACT ADDRESS WITH NUMBERS to start the process of claim in this regard.
Again I guarantee that all is under control and you have nothing to worry about, Just grant to me your full cooperation and keep this transaction close at heart.
Call me on my direct line +60122442893 for more details.
Sincerely yours,

Wong Fong

messages.body:
Honorable Barrister,

In your first mail, you said the amount is:

"...valued at Seventeen million five hundrend dollars (US$17.5 million dollars) is lodged..."

Which is it? 17 million five hundred dollars, (written $17,000,500.00)

or $17.5 million dollars, (spelled out 'Seventeen million, Five Hundred THOUSAND dollars')

Which amount are we talking about? This discrepancy amounts to nearly half a million dollars, and my share of this money would be $225,000, nothing to sneeze at. I am sure you can understand my concern.

May your ancestors rest in perfect harmony in the skies.

Your humble servant, Willard Fong

P.S. I tried to contact you at the telephone number you provide, but there is something wrong with your service.

Am still waiting to hear from you in respect of my last email to you to enable us proceed with this transaction.

Please get back to me ass soon as possible to enable us proceed.

You can call me on +60122442893 for more information.

messages.body:
To Wong Fong,

I have tried a number of times to reach you, but there is nothing but static, then a voice says, "The number you are trying to call can not be accessed."

I don't know why my telephone number has to be provided, not every application I have completed requires such information, but I will comply.

Address: 914 Amaromacs Blvd, Long Island, New York (If you want to contact me immediately, use the electronic mail program.

Phone/fax: 2024355031 I do not have a mobile telephone, my workplace will not allow such devices.

May your Ancestors rest in perfect harmony in the skies.

Willard Fong

I have gone to the bank and file in your details as the next of kin.
As a guiding step,the services of a reputable attorney with international experience on financial and monetary matters to process your legal documents for the claim as would be appropriately applied for, would be very much required. messages.body:
Received: from 



55B-01-03, 1ST FLOOR,
JALAN SUNGAI DUA, GELUGOR 
11700 PENANG

ATTENTION: Willard Fong

I HAVE BEEN APPROPRIATELY BRIEFED OF THE STATE OF YOUR INHERITANCE, AND THE URGENCY IT REQUIRES.I WILL IN ACCORDANCE, APPLY VIA THE HIGH COURT FOR THE REQUIREMENTS NEEDED TO SECURE THE TWO VITAL DOCUMENTS FOR THIS TRANSACTION, TO ACCORD TO YOU THE LOCUS STANDI AS THE BONAFIDE NEXT OF KIN AND TRUE BENEFICIARY TO THIS FUND.

IT IS VERY IMPORTANT THAT YOU CALL ME SO THAT I WILL ADEQUATELY BRIEF YOU ON THE COURT PROCEDURES AS IS OBTAINABLE HERE IN MALAYSIA. DO NOT HESITATE TO FEED ME ON ANY INFORMATION THAT MAY BE OF HELP TO THE SUCCESS OF YOUR CAUSE.

YOU WERE WELL TALKED OF BY YOUR FRIEND, HENCE I WAS MOTIVATED TO REPRESENT YOU IN THIS MATTER.

AS A WAY FORWARD, TWO OPTIONS ARE AVAILABE AS A STEP TOWARDS GETTING THE REQUIREWD DOCUMENTS FROM THE COURT, AND ALSO TO ENSURE THE DUE APPROVAL OF THE FUND FOR PAYMENT IN YOUR NAME.

BELOW ARE THE TWO OPTIONS.STUDY THEM AND LET ME KNOW WHICH OPTION SUITS YOU.

1. YOU CAN CHOOSE TO COME DOWN HERE IN MALAYSIA AND PHYSICALLY ACCOMPANY ME TO THE COURT FOR IDENTIFICATION PURPOSE AND BE AROUND TO PROCESS THE NEXT OF KIN STATUS PAPERS.

OR

2. I WILL GO TO THE COURT WITHOUT YOU COMING DOWN AND WHATEVER THE REQUIREMENT,I SHALL FORWARD TO YOU FOR YOU TO GO THROUGH AND ACT IMMEDIATELY THE TWO OPTIONS ARE OPEN TO YOU AND ANY ONE OF THEM YOU CHOOSE, DO LET ME KNOW FOR PROMPT ACTION.

I WILL DO MY BEST AND ENSURE ALL GOES WELL FOR YOU AND THE RESULT IS ATTAINED.

I EXPECT YOUR IMMEDIATE RESPONSE.

YOURS SINCERELY,

BARRISTER BAHARUDIN SHAFIQ (S.A.M)
(LAWYER IN-CHARGE)

messages.body:
Received: from 





B.S LAW OFFICE

55B-01-03, 1ST FLOOR,
JALAN SUNGAI DUA, GELUGOR 
11700 PENANG

ATTENTION: Willard Fong

HAVING MADE THE NECESSARY VERIFICATIONS FROM THE COURT REGARDING THIS FUND, I DO FRANKLY WISH TO INFORM YOU OF THE FOLLOWING DEVELOPMENTS:

FIRST, I HAVE SUCCESSFULLY SECURED THE "CLEARANCE OF FOREIGNERS LEGAL REPRESENTATION FROM THE COURT OF JURISDICTION (A COPY OF WHICH I HAVE SENT TO YOU , VIA ATTACHMENT) AND I HAVE BEEN IN CONSEQUENCE TO THAT, FULLY BEEN ACCEPTED AND RECOGNIZED TO REPRESENT YOU AND ACT ON YOUR BEHALF IN ALL THE PROCESSES REQUIRED TO SECURE THE PAYMENT DOCUMENTS. TO THIS EFFECT, I AM MANDATED TO ATTEND , (WHERE NECESSARY) MEETINGS WITH THE BANK,SIGN RELEASE ON YOUR BEHALF AND TAKE MAJOR DECISIONS AS WILL BE RELEVANT TOWARDS THE RELEASE OF YOUR PAYMENT.

HAVING BEEN MANDATED AS YOUR LAWYER IN THIS TRANSACTION, I HAVE WITHOUT DELAY COMMENCED WHAT IS NEED TO BE DONE TO BEGIN THE RELEASE PROCESS. I HAVE FILED PAPERS FOR THE RELEASE OF THE RELEASE DOCUMENTS. I DO HEREBY SEND TO YOU VIA ATTACHMENT, THE "DEATH CERTIFICATE OF YOUR RELATIVE", AS WELL AS THE "STATEMENT OF ACCOUNT (WITH THE ACCUMULATED INTEREST DULY CALCULATED" FROM THE BANK. messages.subject: CAN YOU PLEASE UPDATE ME
messages.body:
X-Originating-IP: 






HELLO Willard Fong.

HOW ARE YOU TODAY?CAN YOU PLEASE UPDATE ME ON HOW FAR YOU HAVE GONE WITH BARRISTER BAHARUDIN SHAFIQ (S.A.M) ON THE PROCESSMENT OF ALL THE NECESSARY DOCUMENTS FROM THE COURT.

PLEASE GET BACK TO ME.

REGARDS WONG FONG
messages.raw:
Barr Wong Fong

[Nothing for a week, then...]

X-Originating-IP: [60.48.177.165]

Subject: CAN YOU PLEASE UPDATE ME

HELLO Willard Fong.

HOW ARE YOU TODAY?CAN YOU PLEASE UPDATE ME ON HOW FAR YOU HAVE GONE WITH BARRISTER BAHARUDIN SHAFIQ (S.A.M) ON THE PROCESSMENT OF ALL THE NECESSARY DOCUMENTS FROM THE COURT.

PLEASE GET BACK TO ME.

REGARDS WONG FONG

messages.body:
Dear Wong Fong,

I have not heard from your barrister Shafiq in 8 days. since the 17th of March, but that is no matter, as my esteemed Uncle Long Fong is a guest in my home since 10 days, since the funeral of our relative.

I fear that  may be suspicious of me, Because I am on to him. The longer he delays, the more certain of him I am. Did you tell him that I am concerned that he is a supporter of terrorists?

Now that he does not write to me, after I send him information about me, I think maybe he is going to come and kill me, or have somebody else come to kill me. If that is the case, I will have a surprise for him, that is certain!

Now you write, and ask me this:

"...HOW FAR YOU HAVE GONE WITH BARRISTER BAHARUDIN SHAFIQ (S.A.M) ON THE PROCESSMENT..."

I cannot "go far" with your barrister  if he will not write to me, but I can still retain my attorney, Mr. Skiss to assist me if I do not hear from your Shafiq.

When and if I hear from , I will write to you again.

May your ancestors rest in perfect harmony in the skies.

Your Humble servant, Willard Fong
messages.raw:
Willard Fong
Dear Wong Fong,

I have not heard from your barrister Shafiq in 8 days. since the 17th of March, but that is no matter, as my esteemed Uncle Long Fong is a guest in my home since 10 days, since the funeral of our relative.

I fear that Shafiq may be suspicious of me, Because I am on to him. The longer he delays, the more certain of him I am. Did you tell him that I am concerned that he is a supporter of terrorists?

Now that he does not write to me, after I send him information about me, I think maybe he is going to come and kill me, or have somebody else come to kill me. If that is the case, I will have a surprise for him, that is certain!

Now you write, and ask me this:

"...HOW FAR YOU HAVE GONE WITH BARRISTER BAHARUDIN SHAFIQ (S.A.M) ON THE PROCESSMENT..."

I cannot "go far" with your barrister Shafiq if he will not write to me, but I can still retain my attorney, Mr. Skiss to assist me if I do not hear from your Shafiq.

When and if I hear from Shafiq, I will write to you again.

May your ancestors rest in perfect harmony in the skies.

Your Humble servant, Willard Fong

To Barrister Shafiq:

I will go to the office tomorrow, when it is open, after I have been to my bank at 9:AM, I do not keep large amounts of cash money in my house. That is unwise, don't you agree?

May your ancestors rest in peace in the skies.

Willard Fong

messages.body:
B.S. Law Office:

I have not replied to your last mail until this very date, because I have just heard from a Private Investigator, , who was dispatched by my esteemed relative Long Fong, on my humble behalf, to find out about you and your firm.
 (my friend since childhood, so I may address him thus) tells me that there is no such law office in Malaysia:

B.S LAW OFFICE

55B-01-03, 1ST FLOOR,
JALAN SUNGAI DUA, GELUGOR 
11700 PENANG

Neither was there this office:

WONG FONG & ASSOCIATES 
8TH FLOOR, MENARA SAFUAN,
80, JALAN AMPANG 50450
MALAYSIA

Sir, just what are you trying to do here?  Are you planning to cheat me?  You ask for nearly $2,500.00 and your office does not exist?

I am telling you, that in all my years, I have never been treated so shabbily!  My esteemed relative from Hong Kong, Honorable Long Fong, is angry with me for being so foolish to be cheated!  I fear that I have lost face with him. He looks at me with contempt in his eyes!

Consider this my final correspondence with you, thief.

Willard Fong
messages.raw:
Willard Fong

[Drop this Lad like a bad habit...]

B.S. Law Office:

I have not replied to your last mail until this very date, because I have just heard from a Private Investigator, Thomas Magnum, who was dispatched by my esteemed relative Long Fong, on my humble behalf, to find out about you and your firm.

Tommie (my friend since childhood, so I may address him thus) tells me that there is no such law office in Malaysia:

B.S LAW OFFICE
55B-01-03, 1ST FLOOR,
JALAN SUNGAI DUA, GELUGOR
11700 PENANG

Neither was there this office:

WONG FONG & ASSOCIATES
8TH FLOOR, MENARA SAFUAN,
80, JALAN AMPANG 50450
MALAYSIA

Sir, just what are you trying to do here? Are you planning to cheat me? You ask for nearly $2,500.00 and your office does not exist?

I am telling you, that in all my years, I have never been treated so shabbily! My esteemed relative from Hong Kong, Honorable Long Fong, is angry with me for being so foolish to be cheated! I fear that I have lost face with him. He looks at me with contempt in his eyes!

Consider this my final correspondence with you, thief.

Willard Fong

[Hmmm....More to come? Nope. He bailed, and so will I.]
